verbose_text: Amylorrhea is not a typical symptom of patients with PEI as loss of pancreatic amylase causes only a mild malabsorption of carbohydrates [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR] due to extrapancreatic amylases and the very high activity of the microflora resulting in an almost complete compensative starch fermentation in the hindgut [XREF_BIBR].
